```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
flusurv_df = 
  read_excel('data/flusurv_assignment.xlsx', na = c("99", "")) |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  rename( 
    study_id = study_id1,
    age = age_g,
    month = month1,
    year = year1,
    ) |> 
  mutate(study_id = str_sub(study_id, 8))

view(flusurv_df)
```
